sn36.14:1.1: “Mendicants, suppose there was a guest house. Lodgers come from the east, west, north, and south. Aristocrats, brahmins, merchants, and workers all stay there.
sn36.14:1.2: In the same way, various feelings arise in this body: pleasant, painful, and neutral feelings.
sn36.14:1.3: Also material pleasant, painful, and neutral feelings arise.
sn36.14:1.4: Also spiritual pleasant, painful, and neutral feelings arise.”
